attributes.action: Basic entry criterion for long term enytry to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all agree that communication is a barrier to integration into the UK way of life. To ensure that we improve this basic requirement all immagrants should be tested on entry to be able to speak and read basic english. This should be undertaken at port/airport of boarding and agin on entry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
